# Support

If you need help with OpenPiano, open an issue in this repository.

## Before opening an issue

- Read `README.md`
- Search existing issues
- Include exact reproduction steps

## What to include

- Operating system and version
- OpenPiano version/commit
- MIDI device details (if relevant)
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Logs or screenshots

## Security reports

Do not open public issues for security problems.
Use `.github/SECURITY.md`.
